title: Why don't external mics sound right on Pixel 4?
content:
I used a lapel mic with a headphone jack and a Google-made usb-c adapter on my Pixel 2 just fine. But then when I upgraded to Pixel 4, it sounded awful--it sounded "hot" and loud and the background noise was horrible.

I stupidly assumed it was the lapel mic's fault (that it got damaged somehow) so I bought a brand new one, but this time with a usb-c connection built in. Same problem. 

Did Google seriously worsen the support for external mics from Pixel 2 to Pixel 4?

Is anyone able to get external mics sounding good with Pixel 4?
